}

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"jsx","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`const [person, setPerson] = useState({
  firstName: "Barbara",
  lastName: "Hepworth",
  email: "bhepworth@sculpture.com",
});
//\u4E0D\u8D77\u4F5C\u7528
person.firstName = e.target.value;

//\u6B63\u786E\u505A\u6CD5
setPerson({
  ...person, // Copy the old fields  \u6D45\u62F7\u8D1D
  firstName: e.target.value, // But override this one
});

//\u5D4C\u5957\u7528\u6CD5
setPerson({
  ...person,
  artwork: {
    ...person.artwork,
    image: e.target.value,
  },
});

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`// \u274C
const myNextList = [...myList];
const artwork = myNextList.find(a => a.id === artworkId);
artwork.seen = nextSeen; // Problem: mutates an existing item
setMyList(myNextList);

// \u2705
setMyList(myList.map(artwork => {
  if (artwork.id === artworkId) {
    // Create a *new* object with changes
    return { ...artwork, seen: nextSeen };
  } else {
    // No changes
    return artwork;
  }
});

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`const initialState = { name: '\u5F20\u4E09', age: 20 };

function reducer(state, action) {
    switch(action.type) {
        case 'addAge':
            return { ...state, age: state.age + 1 };
        case ...
        default:
            return state;
    }
}

function App() {
    const [state, dispatch] = useReducer(reducer, initialState);
    // \u60F0\u6027\u521D\u59CB\u5316
    // const [state, dispatch] = useReducer(reducer, initialState, (init) => init);
	function handleClick(taskId) {
		dispatch({ type: 'addAge' } );
	}
    return (
        <div>
            <p>{state.name}\u4ECA\u5E74{state.age}</p>
            <button onClick={handleClick}>\u5E74\u9F84\u52A0\u4E00</button>
        </div>
    );
}

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`import { forwardRef, useRef } from "react";

// \u5B50\u7EC4\u4EF6
const MyInput = forwardRef((props, ref) => {
  const handleCancel = ()=>{}
  // \u66B4\u9732\u5B50\u7EC4\u4EF6\u65B9\u6CD5
  useImperativeHandle(ref, () => ({ handleCancel, }));

  return <input {...props} ref={ref} />;
});

// \u7236\u7EC4\u4EF6
export default function Form() {
  const inputRef = useRef(null);

  function handleClick() {
	// ref.current \u5C06\u76F4\u63A5\u6307\u5411 DOM \u5143\u7D20\u5B9E\u4F8B\u3002
    inputRef.current.handleCancel();
  }

  return (
    <>
      <MyInput ref={inputRef} />
      <button onClick={handleClick}>Focus the input</button>
    </>
  );
}

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`import { useState } from 'react';

// \u81EA\u5B9A\u4E49 Hook\uFF1A\u8BA1\u6570\u5668
function useCounter(initialValue = 0, step = 1) {
  const [count, setCount] = useState(initialValue);

  const increment = () => setCount(count + step);
  const decrement = () => setCount(count - step);
  const reset = () => setCount(initialValue);

  return { count, increment, decrement, reset };
}

// \u4F7F\u7528\u793A\u4F8B
function Counter() {
  const { count, increment, decrement, reset } = useCounter(0, 2);

  return (
    <div>
      <p>Count: {count}</p>
    </div>
  );
}

import Sub from "./SubComponent.js";
import "./App.css";

export default class App extends Component {
  callback(msg) {
    console.log(msg);
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <div>
        <Sub title="\u4ECA\u5E74\u8FC7\u8282\u4E0D\u6536\u793C" callback={this.callback.bind(this)} />
      </div>
    );

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"jsx","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`import React from "react";
//\u53EF\u89E3\u6784({title,callback})=>{}
const Sub = (props) => {
  const cb = (msg) => {
    return () => {
      props.callback(msg);
    };
  };
  return (
    <div>
      <h1>{props.title} </h1>
      <button onClick={cb("\u6211\u4EEC\u901A\u4FE1\u628A")}>\u70B9\u51FB\u6211</button>
    </div>
  );
};

export default Sub;

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"jsx","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`import {useState, useContext, createContext} from 'react';
//1\u3001\u521B\u5EFA\u5E76\u5BFC\u51FA\u5B83
const  ThemeContext = createContext('');

function Child(props){
    //2\u3001\u5B50\u7EC4\u4EF6\u58F0\u660E\u4F7F\u7528
    const theme = useContext(ThemeContext);
    return (
        <span>{theme}</span>
    )
}

function ThemeShow(props){
    const { theme } = props;
    return (
        <div>
            theme is: <Child theme ={theme}/>
        </div>
    )}export defalut function App(){    const [theme,setTheme] = useState('blue');    return(        <div>
            <button onClick={()=> setTheme('red')}> changeTheme</button>
            //3\u3001\u7236\u7EC4\u4EF6\u5305\u88F9\u63D0\u4F9B            <ThemeContext.Provider value={theme}>
                <ThemeShow />
            </ThemeContext.Provider>
        </div>

    )}

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"jsx","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`import React, { Component } from "react";
import PropTypes from "prop-types";
import Sub from "./Sub";
import "./App.css";

export default class App extends Component {
  // \u7236\u7EC4\u4EF6\u58F0\u660E\u81EA\u5DF1\u652F\u6301 context
  static childContextTypes = {
    color: PropTypes.string, //\u6570\u636E\u7C7B\u578B
    callback: PropTypes.func,
  };

  // \u7236\u7EC4\u4EF6\u63D0\u4F9B\u4E00\u4E2A\u51FD\u6570\uFF0C\u7528\u6765\u8FD4\u56DE\u76F8\u5E94\u7684 context \u5BF9\u8C61
  getChildContext() {
    return {
      color: "red",
      callback: this.callback.bind(this),
    };
  }

  callback(msg) {
    console.log(msg);
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <div>
        <Sub></Sub>
      </div>
    );
  }
}

import PropTypes from "prop-types";

export default class SubSub extends Component {
  // \u5B50\u7EC4\u4EF6\u58F0\u660E\u81EA\u5DF1\u9700\u8981\u4F7F\u7528 context
  static contextTypes = {
    color: PropTypes.string,
    callback: PropTypes.func,
  };
  render() {
    const style = { color: this.context.color };
    const cb = (msg) => {
      return () => {
        this.context.callback(msg);
      };
    };
    return (
      <div style={style}>
        SUBSUB <button onClick={cb("\u6211\u80E1\u6C49\u4E09\u53C8\u56DE\u6765\u4E86\uFF01")}>\u70B9\u51FB\u6211</button>
      </div>
    );
  }
}

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`import React, { Component } from "react";
import emitter from "./ev";

export default class Foo extends Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = {
      msg: null,
    };
  }
  componentDidMount() {
    // \u58F0\u660E\u4E00\u4E2A\u81EA\u5B9A\u4E49\u4E8B\u4EF6
    // \u5728\u7EC4\u4EF6\u88C5\u8F7D\u5B8C\u6210\u4EE5\u540E
    this.eventEmitter = emitter.addListener("callMe", (msg) => {
      this.setState({
        msg,
      });
    });
  }
  // \u7EC4\u4EF6\u9500\u6BC1\u524D\u79FB\u9664\u4E8B\u4EF6\u76D1\u542C
  componentWillUnmount() {
    emitter.removeListener(this.eventEmitter);
  }
  render() {
    return <div>{this.state.msg} \u6211\u662F\u975E\u5D4C\u5957 1 \u53F7 </div>;

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`import React, { Component } from "react";
import emitter from "./ev";

export default class Boo extends Component {
  render() {
    const cb = (msg) => {
      return () => {
        // \u89E6\u53D1\u81EA\u5B9A\u4E49\u4E8B\u4EF6
        emitter.emit("callMe", "Hello");
      };
    };
    return (
      <div>
        \u6211\u662F\u975E\u5D4C\u5957 2 \u53F7 <button onClick={cb("blue")}>\u70B9\u51FB\u6211</button>
      </div>
    );
  }
}
